Disease Stage Classification

Middle Stage Care Protocol

Intervention summary for GDS 5-6

Primary Goal: Safety & Emotional Support

Balance safety with dignity. Increase supervision while reducing anxiety.

Daily Focus: Safety & Comfort

  • Wandering prevention
  • Simplified choices
  • Sundowning protocols
  • Activity engagement

Clinical Note

GDS 5-6: Requires ADL assistance. MMSE typically 10-18. BPSD common. Implement sundowning protocols.
